attributes.action: Stop allowing salesmen on Berwick-upon-tweed high street
attributes.additional_details: We shouldn't have people on our high street asking for bank details from vulnerable people this is under hand selling from companies such as Vanquis bank and talk talk to name but a few
attributes.background: Berwick-upon-tweed is an historic market town and lately there are more and more salesman only the high street every day of the week harassing potential customers to the businesses on the high street. We need to keep the Wednesday and Saturday market and ban these sales people
